snippet.title: Real Madrid vs. Barcelona, 2014 El Clásico: Final score 2-1, Los Blancos lift Copa del Rey
snippet.description:
Real Madrid vs. Barcelona, 2014 El Clásico: Final score 2-1, Los Blancos lift Copa del Rey by Zach Woosley on Apr 16 2014, 5:21p
Gareth Bale's short-range strike with five minutes left in the match gave Real Madrid the victory over Barcelona.

snippet.title: MLS has treated returning USMNT players well
snippet.description:
MLS has treated returning USMNT players well by Jeremiah Oshan on Apr 14 2014, 4:51p
Clint Dempsey and Michael Bradley are back in the groove, but the domestic league has been a boon for Michael Parkhurst and Maurice Edu, too.

snippet.title: MLS Week 6: Dempsey back, but Red Bulls, Timbers in trouble
snippet.description:
MLS Week 6: Dempsey back, but Red Bulls, Timbers in trouble by Ryan Rosenblatt on Apr 14 2014, 3:54p
Clint Dempsey is flying, just as his U.S. teammate Michael Bradley is in Toronto, but there aren't a lot of smiling faces in New York and Portland.

snippet.title: Napoli vs Lazio, final score 4-2: Higuain treble sinks Lazio
snippet.description:
Napoli vs Lazio, final score 4-2: Higuain treble sinks Lazio by Shaun Best on Apr 13 2014, 11:20a
Gonzalo Higuain hit a second-half hat-trick as Napoli came from a goal down to defeat 10-man Lazio 4-2 in Naples.

snippet.title: Premier League, Week 34: Liverpool hold title dreams in their hands after defeating Manchester City
snippet.description:
Premier League, Week 34: Liverpool hold title dreams in their hands after defeating Manchester City by Kevin McCauley on Apr 12 2014, 9:56a
Liverpool defeated Manchester City 3-2 on Saturday, making them the clear favorites to claim the EPL title.

snippet.title: MLS, players must work to close salary divide
snippet.description:
MLS, players must work to close salary divide by Jeremiah Oshan on Apr 11 2014, 4:16p
Even though the picture continues to get better for mid-level players, there's still a massive gap between the haves and have nots of MLS.

snippet.title: Premier League, Week 34 preview: Liverpool and Manchester City contest a potential title decider
snippet.description:
Premier League, Week 34 preview: Liverpool and Manchester City contest a potential title decider by Aaron Campeau on Apr 11 2014, 11:29a
Fulham face a must-win at home while Liverpool host Manchester City in what could be the biggest match of the season.

snippet.title: Europa League scores: Juventus advance, Benfica and Sevilla coast
snippet.description:
Europa League scores: Juventus advance, Benfica and Sevilla coast by Kevin McCauley on Apr 10 2014, 4:59p
FC Porto threw away their advantage quickly, while Juventus and Benfica had little trouble hanging onto the leads they built in the first leg.

snippet.title: Chelsea vs. Paris Saint-Germain: When throwing on all your strikers actually works
snippet.description:
Chelsea vs. Paris Saint-Germain: When throwing on all your strikers actually works by Kevin McCauley on Apr 9 2014, 11:34a
Managers employ the throwing on a striker for a midfielder or defender trick less than they used to, mostly because it doesn't work. But Jose Mourinho did it twice in one game, and it worked to...

snippet.title: Liverpool vs. Manchester City betting odds, Match Preview, prediction
snippet.description:
Liverpool vs. Manchester City betting odds, Match Preview, prediction by OddsShark on Apr 8 2014, 12:21p
Liverpool will be small favorites in a crucial EPL betting matchup with Manchester City Sunday. See the latest odds and trends.
